value.title: Power BI Developer in a Day
value.excerpt: The Power BI Developer in a Day online course empowers you as an app developer with the technical knowledge required to embed Power BI content. We recommend you watch the videos in the recorded sequence, starting with video 1 and ending with video 20.

topItems.title: Welcome and Course Introduction | Power BI Developer in a Day
topItems.excerpt: In this video, Peter Myers (Microsoft Most Valued Professional, and course developer) welcomes you to the course. It is video 1 of 21. value.title: Get started building with Power BI
value.excerpt: Power BI is a collection of software services and applications that let you connect to all sorts of data sources and create compelling visuals and reports. You can benefit from receiving those reports, or you can share them with others inside or outside your organization. Learn the basics of Power BI, how its services and applications work together, and how they can be used to create or experience compelling visuals and analytics based on your data.

value.title: Build a Slicer Panel in Power BI and take it to the next level (2019)
value.excerpt: Adam looks at how you can build a slicer panel, in Power BI, and take it to the next level. Using a combination of features in Power BI Desktop, you can make a great user experience.
